snippet: Two readers, including a New York City Council member, object to a proposed 10-cent fee per bag.
abstract: Letter from New York City Council Member James Vacca comments on April 8 editorial about bill before council that will limit the use of plastic bags at retail and grocery stores.
lead_paragraph: Two readers, including a New York City Council member, object to a proposed 10-cent fee per bag.

headline.print_headline: Paying Extra for a Plastic Bag for Your Groceries
headline.main: Paying Extra for a Plastic Bag for Your Groceries
